mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT lxbs from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT val) from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and lxbs=#{zx}
SELECT *, concat(#{zx}, '左幅') as name from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,qdzh,val
SELECT *,concat(#{zx}, '右幅') as name from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs = #{zx} ORDER BY zdbs,qdzh,val

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' and wz=#{zx}) sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh,mcxs.val

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' and wz=#{zx}) sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh,mcxs.val

SELECT mcxs.*,ql.qlname name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '左幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_ql where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '左幅' and wz=#{zx}) ql ON mcxs.proname=ql.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh,mcxs.val

SELECT mcxs.*,ql.qlname name from (SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and htd = #{htd} and cd LIKE '右幅%' and lxbs=#{zx} and qdzh >= #{zhq} and qdzh <= #{zhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_ql where proname = #{proname} and zhq = #{zhq} and zhz = #{zhz} and lf = '右幅' and wz=#{zx}) ql ON mcxs.proname=ql.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh,mcxs.val

SELECT mcxs.*,sd.name from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and cd LIKE '${lf}%' and lxbs=#{zx} AND zdbs=#{bz} and qdzh >= #{sdzhq} and qdzh <= #{sdzhz}) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_sd where proname = #{proname} and zdbz=#{bz} and zhq = #{zhq1} and zhz = #{zhz1} and lf = #{lf} and wz=#{zx}) sd ON mcxs.proname=sd.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh

SELECT mcxs.*, ql.qlname name from ( SELECT * from jjg_zdh_gzsd where proname = #{proname} and cd LIKE '${lf}%' and lxbs=#{zx} AND zdbs=#{bz} and qdzh >= #{qlzhq} and qdzh <= #{qlzhz} ) mcxs LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM jjg_lqs_ql where proname = #{proname} and bz=#{bz} and zhq =#{zhq1} and zhz = #{zhz1} and lf = #{lf} and wz=#{zx}) ql ON mcxs.proname=ql.proname ORDER BY mcxs.qdzh
